name: Paris-At-Night Tour
description:
Being the City of Lights, Paris is as breathtaking at night as it is during the day.  
This tour will take you through the city visiting the most beautiful areas of Paris lit up at night, with our last stop being the Eiffel Tower to see it sparkle.
Throughout most of the year you’ll also get to see the sun set over the city, and the tour can finish at a restaurant for dinner or a cafe/bar for drinks if you prefer.
